name: Katy's Garden
description:
This project is still in development. I started this project to learn the basics of Godot 4. It's an extremely simple gardening game. I've spent 21 hours on it so far. I'm putting development of this one on hold, so I can enter some jams. I plan on coming back to this and making it as polished as I can. I want it to be a tiny, cute, polished game.

Use the arrow keys to walk around. Press the spacebar to interact with the oldman and to pick up/place flowers.
